item.title: Creating custom playfield switch window
item.description: Create Playfield image to use: Open the game in VP and take a screenshot of the editor with the playfield in view. You can do this with Alt + PrtScn. Open Microsoft Paint and paste in you screenshot of the editor. Get there with windows key and typing paint Select the outer playfield and crop it in MsPaint Click resize by pixels, uncheck Maintain aspect ratio and set to 400 x 900 Save this image into your game folder so Godot picks it up and you can assign this to window image.
